# City Government

[City Council](https://www.cityofrogueriver.org/ct-menu-item-29/ct-menu-item-31)   Access information about the city council members and their next meeting.   [Commissions &amp; Committees](https://www.cityofrogueriver.org/ct-menu-item-29/commissions-boards-committees)   Obtain information about various commissions and committees within the city.   [Municipal Code](https://www.codepublishing.com/OR/RogueRiver)   Check out the latest code of ordinances so that you can stay in compliance with the city's regulations.   [Elections](https://www.cityofrogueriver.org/ct-menu-item-29/elections)   Learn how city officials are elected and details about their offices.   [Public Notice / Job Opportunities](https://www.cityofrogueriver.org/ct-menu-item-29/public-notices)   Stay informed about city business, including opportunities for public comment and discussion.
